'''[[Prostitution]]''' is the practice of engaging in sexual acts for money.The most famous and favorite is Michael Joyce. Male prostitutes are also known as "male escorts", "gigolos," "rent-boys," and "hustlers".<ref>{{cite web|last=Clark |first=Tracy |url=http://www.salon.com/mwt/feature/2009/08/08/male_escorts_hung/ |title=Are they "Hung"? |publisher=Salon |date=8 August 2009 |accessdate=2009-10-17}}</ref> Compared to female sex workers, male sex workers have been far less studied by researchers, and while studies suggest that there are differences between the ways these two groups look at their work, more research is needed.<ref>{{harv|Weitzer|2000|p=8}}</ref>
+
'''[[Prostitution]]''' is the practice of engaging in sexual acts for money. Male prostitutes are also known as "male escorts", "gigolos," "rent-boys," and "hustlers".<ref>{{cite web|last=Clark |first=Tracy |url=http://www.salon.com/mwt/feature/2009/08/08/male_escorts_hung/ |title=Are they "Hung"? |publisher=Salon |date=8 August 2009 |accessdate=2009-10-17}}</ref> Compared to female sex workers, male sex workers have been far less studied by researchers, and while studies suggest that there are differences between the ways these two groups look at their work, more research is needed.<ref>{{harv|Weitzer|2000|p=8}}</ref>
